name: Classic French Ratatouille
description: Hearty vegetable stew featuring eggplant, zucchini, and bell peppers in a tomato base, seasoned with Herbes de Provence.
cooking_instructions: Sauté vegetables separately, layer in a pot, cover with tomato sauce, and simmer.

name: Indian Butter Chicken
description: Creamy tomato-based curry cooked with marinated grilled chicken, enriched with butter and cream, flavored with garam masala.
cooking_instructions: Marinate and grill chicken. Cook onion, garlic, ginger, spices, and tomato. Add chicken and cream.

name: Mexican Tacos al Pastor
description: Pork shoulder marinated in a blend of chilies, spices, and pineapple, then roasted and served on corn tortillas with cilantro and onions.
cooking_instructions: Marinate pork, roast with pineapple, chop, and serve on tortillas with toppings.

name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: A simple yet classic Italian pizza with a crisp crust, tangy tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.
cooking_instructions: Stretch out the dough, apply sauce, add cheese and basil, drizzle with oil, season, and bake in a preheated oven at the highest temperature until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: A rich French stew with tender beef braised in red wine, with a savory assortment of mushrooms, pearl onions, and bacon.
cooking_instructions: Brown the beef and bacon in olive oil. Remove and set aside. In the same pot, cook the onion and carrots. Sprinkle flour, cook for a minute. Add wine, stock, garlic, and bouquet garni. Return beef and bacon to pot. Simmer for 2 hours. Sauté mushrooms and pearl onions separately and add to the stew. Cook for another 30 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with crusty bread.

name: Roasted Vegetable Medley
description: A colorful and healthy assortment of roasted vegetables seasoned with herbs and olive oil.
cooking_instructions: Chop the vegetables into even pieces. Toss with olive oil, minced garlic, salt, pepper, and Italian herbs. Spread on a baking sheet. Roast in a preheated oven until vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized. Serve warm as a side dish or over rice for a main course.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A beloved Indian dish featuring grilled marinated chicken pieces smothered in a creamy, spiced tomato sauce.
cooking_instructions: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices, then grill until cooked. For the sauce, sauté garlic and jalapeno, add spices, tomato sauce, and cream. Simmer until thickened. Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes. Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: A timeless salad with crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and a creamy Parmesan dressing.
cooking_instructions: Whisk together egg yolks, lemon juice, finely chopped anchovies, garlic, Dijon mustard, and Worcestershire sauce. Gradually blend in olive oil to make a creamy dressing. Toss romaine lettuce with the dressing, add croutons and shaved Parmesan cheese. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

name: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillets marinated with a zesty lemon herb mixture for a light and flavorful seafood dish.
cooking_instructions: Combine lemon zest, lemon juice, chopped dill, parsley, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper to create a marinade. Coat the salmon and let it marinate. Grill the salmon to desired doneness. Serve with extra lemon wedges and a sprinkle of fresh herbs.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
description: A hearty and nutritious salad with a Southwestern twist, featuring quinoa, black beans, and a variety of fresh vegetables.
cooking_instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool. Rinse and drain black beans. Dice the bell pepper and avocado. Chop cilantro. Whisk together lime juice, olive oil, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper to make the dressing. Toss all ingredients with the dressing and serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Pan-Seared Duck Breast
description: A succulent duck breast with a crisp skin, served with a rich and aromatic orange sauce.
cooking_instructions: Score the duck skin, season with salt and pepper, and sear on the skin side down until crisp. Flip and cook to desired doneness. For the sauce, caramelize sugar, deglaze with vinegar, add orange juice, zest, stock, and reduce. Finish with a splash of cognac and swirl in butter. Serve the sliced duck with the orange sauce.

name: Spinach and Ricotta Stuffed Shells
description: Jumbo pasta shells filled with creamy ricotta and spinach, baked in a savory tomato sauce.
cooking_instructions: Boil pasta shells until al dente. Mix ricotta, cooked spinach, egg, and Parmesan. Fill each shell with the mixture, place in a baking dish, cover with tomato sauce and mozzarella. Bake until bubbly and golden on top.

name: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
description: A stir-fry dish with ground chicken, Thai basil, and a flavorful sauce, served over jasmine rice.
cooking_instructions: Stir-fry garlic and chilies, add chicken until browned. Mix in soy, oyster, and fish sauces with sugar, cook until caramelized. Stir in basil leaves until wilted. Serve over cooked jasmine rice.

name: Maple Glazed Carrots
description: Tender carrots glazed in a sweet and buttery maple syrup sauce, sprinkled with fresh herbs.
cooking_instructions: Cook carrots in boiling water until tender. Drain and sauté with butter, maple syrup, salt, and pepper. Garnish with thyme before serving.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent dessert with a gooey chocolate center, perfect with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
cooking_instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together. Whisk eggs and sugar, then fold in the chocolate mixture and flour. Pour into ramekins and bake until edges are firm but center is runny. Serve warm.

name: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
description: A classic Italian risotto with earthy mushrooms and rich Parmesan cheese.
cooking_instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms in olive oil. Add rice, toast slightly, then deglaze with wine. Gradually add stock, stirring continuously. Finish with butter, Parmesan, and thyme.

name: Lamb Rogan Josh
description: Aromatic Kashmiri dish featuring tender pieces of lamb in a rich and spicy tomato sauce.
cooking_instructions: Marinate lamb in yogurt and spices. Brown lamb in oil, set aside. Cook down tomatoes with remaining spices. Return lamb to pot, cover, and simmer until tender.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
description: A smooth and creamy soup made with roasted butternut squash and a hint of nutmeg.
cooking_instructions: Roast butternut squash until tender. Sauté onion and garlic in butter. Blend squash with sautéed mixture and stock. Simmer, add cream, nutmeg, salt, and pepper.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy beer-battered fish served with golden fried chips, a British classic.
cooking_instructions: Dip fish fillets in beer batter. Deep fry until golden. Cut potatoes into chips, fry until crispy. Serve with lemon wedges and tartar sauce.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: A sweet dessert pie with a spiced pumpkin-based custard filling in a flaky crust.
cooking_instructions: Mix pumpkin puree with eggs, cream, sugar, and spices. Pour into pie crust. Bake until filling is set and crust is golden.
